tool_description: HHfilter processes multiple sequence alignments (MSA) to filter out redundant sequences based on sequence identity, coverage, and other criteria, producing a refined MSA.

required_parameters.name: input_msa
required_parameters.description: The input multiple sequence alignment (MSA) file, typically in A3M format, to be filtered.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The maximum pairwise sequence identity allowed between sequences in the MSA.

optional_parameters.name: cov
optional_parameters.description: The minimum coverage of sequences compared to the query sequence, expressed as a percentage.

optional_parameters.name: diff
optional_parameters.description: The maximum allowable length difference between the longest and shortest sequences in the MSA.

return_values.name: filtered_msa
return_values.description: The output filtered MSA file in A3M format, containing sequences that meet the specified filtering criteria.
